analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x6d835879a256978755b8f3a3ec2c76c5188404f5.sol:
	Contract UncToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x6d835879a256978755b8f3a3ec2c76c5188404f5.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x6d835879a256978755b8f3a3ec2c76c5188404f5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_contracts/0x6d835879a256978755b8f3a3ec2c76c5188404f5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x6d835879a256978755b8f3a3ec2c76c5188404f5.sol#23-24) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addr' of UncToken.setTransferAdmin (/unique_contracts/0x6d835879a256978755b8f3a3ec2c76c5188404f5.sol#226-227) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_canTransfer' of UncToken.setTransferAdmin (/unique_contracts/0x6d835879a256978755b8f3a3ec2c76c5188404f5.sol#227-229) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of UncToken.burn (/unique_contracts/0x6d835879a256978755b8f3a3ec2c76c5188404f5.sol#238) is not in mixedCase
